definition: A part of the human body located above the eyes and below the hairline, typically associated with the forehead. It is commonly referred to in the context of facial features and expressions, and is often used to convey emotions or indicate thoughtfulness.

examples.german: Die Sonne brannte auf ihre Stirn.
examples.english: The sun burned on her forehead.

examples.german: Er runzelte die Stirn, als er die schlechte Nachricht hörte.
examples.english: He frowned when he heard the bad news.

examples.german: Sie hatte eine hohe Stirn und dunkle Haare.
examples.english: She had a high forehead and dark hair.

examples.german: Er wischte sich den Schweiß von der Stirn.
examples.english: He wiped the sweat off his forehead.

examples.german: Die Stirn ist die vordere Oberfläche des Kopfes.
examples.english: The forehead is the front surface of the head.
